word: In the healing of the withered hand, Jesus condemned the custom of the Jews, and left the fourth commandment standing as God had given it. \93It is lawful to do well on the sabbath days,\94 He declared. By sweeping away the senseless restrictions of the Jews, Christ honored the Sabbath, while those who complained of Him were dishonoring God\92s holy day.\97The Desire of Ages, pp. 286, 287.
